steps.title: In Space, No One Can Hear You Scream
steps.text:
“He mentioned the establishment of the Dynasty in Carcosa, the lakes which connected Hastur, Aldebaran, and the mystery of the Hyades. He spoke of Cassilda and Camilla, and sounded the cloudy depths of Demhe and the Lake of Hali.”
– Robert W. Chambers, “The Repairer of Reputations”

It is 2147, and you have just woken up from cryo-sleep in a seemingly abandoned starship - and from there on you are thrown into a deep space adventure across the solar system to prevent the extinction of the human race. Based on Call of Cthulhu supplements Ripples from Carcosa by Oscar Rios and the End Time by Dr. Michael C. LaBossiere, Dark Matter is an 8 scenario campaign for Arkham Horror: The Card Game for 1-4 players.

choices.description: I want to go to the Moon
I want to go where no one has ever gone before

achievements.title: Untattered
achievements.text: Complete The Tatterdemalion with no cards left in the scanning deck.

achievements.title: Airlock Sequence
achievements.text: Defeat three enemies using the ability on Escape Pod Bay in The Tatterdemalion.

achievements.title: Mental Fortitude
achievements.text: Defeat the Shadow of Thoughts in Electric Nightmare.

achievements.title: Brain Burn
achievements.text: Defeat the Boogeyman in Electric Nightmare while spending fewer than 6 [per_investigator] clues during the scenario.

achievements.title: Out of Time
achievements.text: Defeat all three copies of Hound of Tindalosin Lost Quantum

achievements.title: Savior of Nostalgia
achievements.text: Save 5 or more [[Crew]] story assets and defeat the Entity in In the Shadow of Earth.

achievements.title: Neuroscientist
achievements.text: Complete Strange Moons with no cards left in the scanning deck and no damage on any [[Brain]] story asset.

achievements.title: Self Help
achievements.text: Defeat all copies of Your Other Self without spending clues during the last act of The Machine in Yellow.

achievements.title: Endtimes
achievements.text: Win the Dark Matter campaign with 4 [elder_thing] tokens, 3 [tablet] tokens, and no [elder_sign] token in the chaos bag at the end.

achievements.title: It's Too Late
achievements.text: Win the Dark Matter campaign with 12 or more Impending Doom.

achievements.title: Line in the Sky
achievements.text: Win the Dark Matter campaign with at least three Ultimatums active.

achievements.title: The Heir to Carcosa
achievements.text: Win the Dark Matter campaign on Expert difficulty by defeating Tassilda in Starfall.

ultimatums.name: Ultimatum of the Unspeakable Oath
ultimatums.text: Each time you speak the name of HASTUR or TASSILDA aloud during the setup or play of a scenario, immediately take 1 horror.

ultimatums.name: Ultimatum of Impending Doom
ultimatums.text: Begin each scenario with doom on the agenda equal to the amount of Impending Doom.

ultimatums.name: Ultimatum of The Feaster
ultimatums.text: During the setup of each scenario with a scanning deck, shuffle The Feaster from Afar into the scanning deck.

ultimatums.name: Ultimatum of Inevitability
ultimatums.text: Begin the campaign with 3 tally marks under Impending Doom.

ultimatums.name: Ultimatum of the Dark Past
ultimatums.text: During the setup of each scenario, if it is not already in the encounter deck shuffle the Dark Past encounter set into the encounter deck. During the resolution of those scenarios, if there is a copy of Reminiscence in the victory display, you must add a [tablet] token to the chaos bag. (if there are already 4 [tablet] tokens in the bag, each investigator suffers 1 mental trauma instead.)

ultimatums.name: Ultimatum of Exploration
ultimatums.text: Each time you successfully scan, shuffle the top card of the encounter deck into the scanning deck. When you scan, encounter cards without a scanning back are considered to have icons matching any icon. A scan where you draw an encounter card without a scanning back is considered an unsuccessful scan.

ultimatums.name: Ultimatum of Anachronism
ultimatums.text: As an additional cost to play unique non-story assets, cross out 1 tally mark from your "Memories".
